content: sizes - s/m length 21 cm width 20 cm - l/xl length 21 cm width 23 cm materials fjallalopi one 50 g ball double pointed needles 3 mm us 3 and 3 5 mm us 4 gauge 10 x 10 cm = 22 stitches and 29 row in stockinette stitch using 3 5 mm needles check gauge and adjust needle size if necessary note the hand warmers are worked in the round round begins on thumb side of the wrist
